name: Hello Alien! Welcome to Mimiloo!
description:
Proud warrior of Grundar race - Prisco, is hunted by space amazoness. Apparently he has something belonging to them. There is nowhere to run, but there is a place to hide. Old and forgotten space station Mimiloo is an only hope for poor chitin being.
What is inside the station and how many friends he will collect along the way?

Hello Alien! Welcome to Mimiloo!
Prototype version 0.0.1

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
Z - Interact
X - Cancel
Page Up - Debug saving after certain point of the playthrough

Credits:
Made by Saint Sugar for Riggy2k3 "DEPENDABLE FRIEND" Jam
Created in RPG MAKER MZ with includes some of the assets

Special thanks:
"Midnight Laboratory" for the title music track
